item.title: Compare at price
item.description: Introduction This is a feature on Shopify that allows clients to add an additional price lists that can be used as their compare at price Configuration S2S requires two price lists: Now Price: This is the price of the product that the products must sell for NOW Was Price: This is the price of the product that the product WAS selling for Below are the rules of how it works:
